abstract: Nestle USA is voluntarily recalling some DiGiorno, Lean Cuisine and Stouffer's products because they may contain small pieces of glass.

headline.print_headline: Fearing Glass Contamination, Nestlé Issues a Limited Recall
headline.main: Fearing Glass Contamination, Nestlé Issues a Limited Recall

snippet: Nestlé USA is voluntarily recalling a limited number of DiGiorno, Lean Cuisine and Stouffer’s products.
lead_paragraph: Nestlé USA is voluntarily recalling a limited number of DiGiorno, Lean Cuisine and Stouffer’s products.
